maqras.text: 19|59|Tadera pare asalo ayogya uttarasurira [1], tara salata nasta karala [2] ebam ku-prabrttira [3] anubarti hala. Kaje'i acire'i tara ksatigrastatara [4] sam'mukhina habe.
19|60|Kintu tara naya--- yara ta'oba kareche, imana eneche o satkaja kareche. Tara to jannate prabesa karabe. Ara tadera prati kono yuluma habe na.
19|61|Eta sthayi jannata, ye gayebi pratisrati dayamaya tamra bandaderake diyechena [1]. Niscaya tamra pratisruta bisaya asabe'i.
19|62|Sekhane tara ‘salama’ tatha santi chara an'ya kono asara bakya sunabe na [1] ebam sekhane sakala sandhya tadera jan'ya thakabe tadera riyika [2].
19|63|E se jannata, yara adhikari karaba amara amadera bandadera madhye muttakiderake [1].
19|64|‘Ara amara apanara rabera adesa chara abatarana kari na [1]; ya amadera samane o pichane ache o ya e du’yera antarbarti ta tamra'i. Ara apanara raba bismrta hana na [2].’

19|65|Tini asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera antarbarti ya kichu ache, se sabera raba. Kaje'i tamra'i ibadata karuna ebam tamra ibadate dhairyasila thakuna [1]. Apani ki tamra samanamagunasampanna ka'uke'o janena [2]
19|66|ara manusa bale, ‘amara mrtyu hale ami ki jibita abasthaya ut'thita haba?’
19|67|Manusa ki smarana kare na ye, amara take age srsti karechi yakhana se kichu'i chila na [1]
19|68|kaje'i sapatha apanara rabera! Amara to taderake o sayatanaderake ekatre samabeta karaba'i [1] tarapara amara natajanu abasthaya jahannamera caradike taderake upasthita karaba'i [2].
19|69|Tarapara pratyeka dalera madhye ye dayamayera sarbadhika abadhya amara take tene bera karaba'i [1].
19|70|Tarapara amara to tadera madhye jahanname dagdha ha'oyara yara sabaceye besi yogya tadera bisaya bhala jani.
19|71|Ara tomadera pratyeke'i tara (jahannamera) upara diye'i atikrama karabe [1], eta apanara rabera anibarya sid'dhanta.
19|72|Pare amara ud'dhara karaba taderake, yara taka'oya abalambana kareche ebam yalemaderake sekhane natajanu abasthaya rekhe deba.
19|73|Ara tadera kache amadera spasta ayatasamuha tela'oyata kara hale kapherara muminaderake bale, du’dalera madhye kara maryadaya sresthatara o majalisa hisebe uttama [1]
19|74|ara tadera age amara bahu manabagosthike binasa karechi---yara tadera ceye sampada o bahyadrstite srestha chila.

19|75|Baluna, ‘yara bibhrantite ache, dayamaya taderake pracura abakasa debena yataksana na tara ye bisaye taderake satarka kara hacche ta dekhabe; ta sasti hoka ba keyamata'i hoka [1]. Atahpara tara janate parabe ke maryadaya nikrsta o ke dalabale durbala.
19|76|Ara yara satpathe cale allah tadera hedayata brd'dhi kare dena [1]; ebam sthayi satkaja samuha [2] apanara rabera puraskara praptira jan'ya srestha ebam parinatira dika diye'o ati uttama.
19|77|Apani ki jenechena (ebam ascarya hayechena) se byakti samparke, ye amadera ayatasamuhe kuphari kare ebam bale, ‘amake abasya'i dhana-sampada o santana-santati deya habe [1].
19|78|Se ki gayeba dekhe niyeche, naki dayamayera kacha theke pratisruti labha kareche
19|79|kakhana'i naya, se ya bale amara ta likhe rakhaba ebam tamra sasti brd'dha'i karate thakaba [1].
19|80|Ara se ya bale ta thakabe amadera adhikare [1] ebam se amadera kache asabe eka.
19|81|Ara tara allah chara an'ya bahu ilaha grahana kareche, yate ora tadera sahaya haya [1]
19|82|Kakhana'i naya, ora to tadera ibadata asbikara karabe ebam tadera birodhi haye yabe [1].
19|83|Apani ki laksya karenani ye, amara kapheradera jan'ya sayatanaderake chere rekhechi, taderake manda kaje bisesabhabe pralubdha karara jan'ya [1]
19|84|kaje'i tadera bisaye apani taratari karabena na. Amara to gunachi tadera nirdharita kala [1]
19|85|yedina dayamayera nikata muttakiganake sam'manita mehamanarupe [1] amara samabeta karaba
19|86|ebam aparadhiderake trsnatura abasthaya jahannamera dike hamkiye niye yabo.
19|87|Yara dayamayera kacha theke pratisruti niyeche, tara chara ke'u suparisa karara malika habe na [1].
19|88|Ara tara bale, ‘dayamaya santana grahana karechena’.
19|89|Tomara to emana eka bibhatsa bisayera abatarana karacha
19|90|yate asamanasamuha bidirna haye ya'oyara upakrama haya, ara yamina khanda-bikhanda ebam parbatamandali curna-bicurna haye apatita habe
19|91|e jan'ya ye, tara dayamayera prati santana arapa kare [1].
19|92|Athaca santana grahana kara dayamayera jan'ya sobhana naya
19|93|asamanasamuha o yamine emana ke'u ne'i, ye dayamayera kache bandarupe upasthita habe na.
19|94|Tini tadera sankhya janena ebam tini taderake bisesabhabe gune rekhechena [1].
19|95|Ara kiyamatera dina tadera saba'i tamra kache asabe ekaki abasthaya.
19|96|Niscaya yara imana ane o satkaja kare dayamaya abasya'i tadera jan'ya srsti karena bhalabasa [1].
19|97|Ara amara to apanara jabanite kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi yate apani ta dbara muttakiderake susambada dite parena ebam bitandapriya sampradayake ta dbara satarka karate parena.
19|98|Ara tadera age amara bahu prajanmake binasa karechi! Apani ki tadera karo astitba anubhaba karena athaba ksinatama sabda'o sunate pana [1]
